alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 21 at 4:28PM AKDT until March 22 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Kodiak Island, particularly western facing capes and bays near Shelikof Strait and areas north of and including Kodiak City. * WHEN...From 4 AM AKDT Wednesday through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions possible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong storm will move over the southern half of Kodiak Island late tonight. The combination of strong winds and snow on the backside of the low may produce blizzard conditions. There remains some uncertainty in the forecasted low track.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
